sequence:
Loaded with Lead and Love

<size=45>Chapter 7 - A Maid's Feelings (Part 2)</size>

scripts.say: Port - Bedroom
Good morning, Commander. For you to be awake at this time... should I actually be saying "good night?"
Not quite, but it is true that I haven't been able to get back to sleep...
Sheffield, I was thinking of giving you a leave.

options.content: Tell her that she can go home today

scripts.say: For some reason, Sheffield's normally fluid, adroit movements suddenly ground to a halt.
Looking back at it, I realized how much I've been imposing on you unwittingly, never even paying attention to what you really wanted to do, so...
Master...
Sheffield suddenly drew close and put her hand on my forehead.
You don't seem to have a fever... did you perhaps hit your head?
I don't think I've ever been tended to more rudely.
So, that's what happened. You heard the conversation I had with Newcastle...
Good grief, as expected of you, Master. Jumping to conclusions without hearing the whole story.
Sheffield let out a long sigh.
The discussion we were having just now, was actually about romance.
R-romance?!!
Newcastle told me that since I love you, I should be brave and tell you directly.
I thought that it would be fine to just stay by your side like this, but if Master decides to develop strange misconceptions, I have no choice but to be clear.
Sheffield looked straight at me.
Master, are you troubled by the way I talk and act toward you? If so, you must understand that is the way I express my love.
Master, for me, being able to serve you forever is my one true wish, my happiness.
Master, I love you. So very much.
Even her confession was true to herself.
Though our journey together was full of detours, I knew just how I wanted to respond to her feelings
